import Header from "../../components/Header" import Sidebar from "../../components/Sidebar" import Footer from "../../components/Footer" import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function AddCategory(){ const initialState = { name: "", } const [data, setCategoriesData] = useState([]); const [state, setState] = useState(initialState); const {name} = initialState; const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); } const handleInputChange = (e) => useEffect(() => { getCategories(); }, []) const getCategories = async () =>{ const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:8090/api/categories"); if(response.status === 200){ setCategoriesData(response.data.data); } } return (
